UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Design, characterization and structure-function analysis of novel antimicrobial peptides based on the N-terminal CATH-2 fragment.
Literature.Author: Sharma P, Sharma S, Joshi S, Barman P, Bhatt A, Maan M, Singla N, Rishi P, Ali ME, Preet S, Saini A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=216 µg/ml,Murine macrophages:10% Cell death=1978.47 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium NCTC 74(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 9144(MIC=16µg/ml)
